banner-title: Steel solutions for bodywork and other industrial sectors
banner2-title: Design and manufacture of components and accessories
banner2-description: At MRF we design, develop and manufacture steel solutions for the industry. We are specialized in locks, hinges, frames and other components for bodywork
banner3-description: MRF is continuing to undergo an important diversification into an industrial co-development which involves different and diverse markets apart from the bodywork industry
